text: Great environment with two grand pianos. The teachers are very professional and patience while teaching.

It’s been a few months from now, that I continue to develop my piano skill at Chong music studio. I can tell that it has been an incredibly rewarding experience. With Mr Chong who has made the learning process both enjoyable and structured. Over time, I’ve also noticed my skills progressing—whether it's getting more comfortable with reading sheet music or learning how to play more complex pieces.

I’ve had the privilege of learning piano from Ms Lim and Mr Chong and I can confidently say they are an incredible teacher. Their deep understanding of technique, musicality, and expression has helped me make significant progress. They are patient, encouraging, and always find ways to tailor lessons to my needs, making each session both challenging and enjoyable.

Thanks to their guidance, I’ve improved my finger strength, control, and overall playing confidence.

My kids having piano class here, very progressive and they all score well in their piano exams, I am so proud of them 🥰
Thanks to their teachers 🙏🏻
My teacher is very patient and commited when it comes to teaching. She made my lessons more enjoyable and fun!!! Highly recommended!!!👍👍👍
